about_the_game:
The game is already available for download on Windows, Android, Linux, and MacOS. Click "Visit the website" in the "Links & info" section (right column on PC).

For fans of genres:

RPG-style storytelling

  • Psychological horror

  • Smart main character

  • Huge amount of modern humor

Based on the author`s madness

StyxStories presents

The first visual epic fantasy (expected around 10 books)

and the 3rd part of the Bible - "Neon Testament"

being created together with you on my Patreon, where I also post plenty of resources from the development process.

PLOT:

Hundreds of universes merged into one when the Gods decided to finally settle who among them is the Greatest and who must vanish. The main character, nicknamed Black, finds himself at the center of unbelievable events after the Ancient and Terrifying One saw something in him and chose this unremarkable guy as a "character" in the Gods' role-playing Game.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes some depictions of violence, such as characters being harmed during combat, with a small amount of blood. The violence is minimal and presented only in a drawn format. The atmosphere is tense and sometimes unsettling, aligning with the thriller genre. Dialogue occasionally touches on acute social topics, but without propaganda or explicit details. There's also mild suggestive language, though it remains subtle.
